trans-unit.source: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un elemento della legenda viene archiviato nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The LegendItem class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item: - Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points.
trans-unit.target: La classe LegendItem rappresenta un elemento della legenda può essere un elemento personalizzato o predefinito:-elementi della legenda predefiniti vengono inseriti automaticamente nella legenda per una serie di dati o i punti dati.

trans-unit.source: Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series.
trans-unit.target: Le voci predefinite per i grafici a torta e ad anello rappresentano i punti dati tracciati, mentre le voci per tutti gli altri tipi di grafico rappresentano la serie tracciata.

trans-unit.source: By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, queste voci di legenda utilizzano il colore di punto o una serie di dati per il colore del simbolo e il nome del punto di serie di dati o per il testo delle voci della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Elementi della legenda predefiniti possono essere personalizzati o eliminati in fase di esecuzione utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: - Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: -Elementi della legenda personalizzati sono testo definito dall'utente, colore del simbolo e così via.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data.
trans-unit.target: A differenza delle voci predefinite, non sono connessi con i dati tracciati.

trans-unit.source: Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
trans-unit.target: Elementi della legenda personalizzati possono essere aggiunto in fase di progettazione o nella fase di esecuzione utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting of a LegendItem object.
trans-unit.target: I simboli della legenda possono essere rettangoli, linee o i marcatori, a seconda di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>impostazione della proprietà di un oggetto LegendItem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of a custom legend item is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il testo di un elemento della legenda personalizzato varia a seconda di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per creare e inizializzare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> collection property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che è anche possibile aggiungere elementi della legenda personalizzati utilizzando il `Add` e `Insert` metodi associati il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>proprietà dell'insieme di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class with the specified name, color and image path.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"> </xref> classe con il nome, il colore e immagine di percorso specificato.

trans-unit.source: Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified.
trans-unit.target: Solo il `image` o `color` parametro deve essere specificata.

trans-unit.source: If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se vengono specificati entrambi, il `image` parametro ha la precedenza.

trans-unit.source: The name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The color of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Il colore dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso dell'immagine da visualizzare per l'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'orientamento della sfumatura di sfondo di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: Determina inoltre se viene utilizzata una sfumatura.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà BackGradientStyle per determinare se un titolo visualizzerà una sfumatura e per determinare l'orientamento della sfumatura se viene utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene implementata solo se la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco dei modelli disponibili, consultare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>enumerazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare i colori sfumati:-utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>proprietà per impostare il colore primario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the BackGradientStyle property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: -Utilizzare la proprietà BackGradientStyle per impostare il colore secondario.

trans-unit.source: - Use this BackGradientStyle property to set the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Utilizzare questa proprietà BackGradientStyle per impostare lo stile di sfumatura desiderato.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> enumerazione che specifica l'orientamento della sfumatura di sfondo di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile di tratteggio di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>enumerazione specifica il motivo di tratteggio utilizzato da un pennello di tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: Il motivo a tratteggio è costituito da un colore di sfondo a tinta unita e delle linee disegnate sullo sfondo.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di stili di tratteggio disponibili, consultare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>enumerazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il colore delle linee tratteggiate è determinato dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> enumerazione che specifica lo stile di tratteggio di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un colore che verrà sostituito con un colore trasparente quando l'immagine di sfondo viene disegnato.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore che verrà visualizzato come trasparente quando viene disegnata l'immagine di sfondo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore secondario di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The BackSecondaryColor property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà BackSecondaryColor è una delle varie proprietà correlate che determinano il colore di sfondo secondario di molti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>oggetti; viene utilizzato quando vengono applicati colori sfumati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene implementata solo se la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare BackSecondaryColor su qualsiasi valore ARGB (alfa, rosso, verde e blu) valido.

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza tratteggio, la proprietà BackSecondaryColor determina il colore delle linee tratteggiate per l'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background: To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare i colori sfumati per lo sfondo di una cella di legenda: per utilizzare i colori sfumati:-utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>proprietà per impostare il colore primario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: -Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>proprietà per impostare il colore secondario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>proprietà per impostare lo stile di sfumato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore utilizzato per il colore di sfondo con tratteggio o riempimento sfumato secondario.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore del bordo di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare questa proprietà su qualsiasi valore ARGB (alfa, rosso, verde e blu) valido.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you use a marker for a custom legend item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se si utilizza un marcatore per un elemento della legenda personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: this property will set the border color of the marker.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà verrà impostato il colore del bordo del marcatore.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A> property is also set, its value has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A>proprietà è impostata, il relativo valore ha la precedenza.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the border color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore utilizzato per disegnare il colore del bordo di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il colore predefinito è <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile del bordo di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the line style used for a border.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà determina lo stile di linea utilizzato per un bordo.

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: La riga può essere a tinta unita, punti e così via.

trans-unit.source: For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Per altri stili di bordo, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>argomento relativo all'enumerazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> valore di enumerazione che determina lo stile del bordo dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo spessore del bordo di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The BorderWidth property can also be used to set the width of lines when, for example, custom legend items are displayed with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà BorderWidth può essere utilizzata anche per impostare la larghezza delle righe quando, ad esempio, gli elementi della legenda personalizzato vengono visualizzati con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>style.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **Nota** questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An<xref uid="langword_csharp_ integer" name=" integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the width, in pixels, of the legend item border.
trans-unit.target: Un<xref uid="langword_csharp_ integer" name=" integer" href=""> </xref> valore che determina la larghezza, in pixel, del bordo elemento legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells in the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di celle nell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: A legend item consists of one or more legend cells, each represented by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> object and stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Un elemento della legenda è costituito da uno o più celle della legenda, ognuno rappresentato da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetto e archiviati in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile all'intero <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection"></xref> object that represents the collection of cells in the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta la raccolta di celle nell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: This Color property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà di colore è che una delle diverse proprietà correlate che ottiene o imposta il colore di molti elementi del grafico. è possibile impostare qualsiasi valore ARGB (alfa, rosso, verde e blu).

trans-unit.source: If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà è impostata per un punto dati e la serie, il colore dei punti dati avrà la precedenza.

trans-unit.source: The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color.
trans-unit.target: Il colore della serie verrà utilizzato solo per i punti dati che non definiscono i propri colori.

trans-unit.source: If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color.
trans-unit.target: Se un elemento della legenda personalizzato utilizza un marcatore, questa proprietà determina il colore del marcatore.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property is set, its value then has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>proprietà è impostata, il relativo valore, quindi ha la precedenza.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property will be ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A> property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà verrà ignorata se la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A>proprietà specifica un'immagine da utilizzare per il simbolo di elemento della legenda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that is used to draw the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore utilizzato per disegnare l'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il colore predefinito è <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend item is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un flag che indica se l'elemento della legenda è abilitato.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è applicabile all'intero <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the legend item is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento della legenda è abilitata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'immagine che verrà visualizzato per un simbolo di elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the image file to be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> symbol.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà determina il file di immagine da utilizzare per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>simbolo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: The path can be an absolute or a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso può essere un URL relativo o assoluto.

trans-unit.source: If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta un'immagine di sfondo, indipendentemente dal valore verrà visualizzato l'immagine di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>l'impostazione della proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>proprietà per abilitare un colore utilizzato per l'immagine trasparente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta l'URL di un file di immagine.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display style of the legend item image.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile di visualizzazione dell'immagine di elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Questi stili determinano la modalità di visualizzazione di simboli corrispondente dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style can be combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>stile può essere combinato con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>style.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, first set the ImageStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: A tale scopo, impostare innanzitutto la proprietà ImageStyle per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A> property to specify a marker image, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to specify a marker style.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare quindi la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A>proprietà per specificare un'immagine del marcatore o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>proprietà per specificare uno stile del marcatore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker.
trans-unit.target: Il simbolo risultante sarà una combinazione di una riga e un'immagine o un marcatore.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the display style of the legend item image.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle"> </xref> valore di enumerazione che specifica lo stile di visualizzazione dell'immagine di elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object associated with this legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> oggetto associato a questo elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object associated with this legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> oggetto associato a questo elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore del bordo dei marcatori, se in uso.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare gli indicatori, impostare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>proprietà su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that markers will not be applied to pie, doughnut, and any stacked chart types.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che gli indicatori non verranno applicati al grafico a torta, ad anello e qualsiasi in pila tipi di grafico.

trans-unit.source: For custom legends, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property will also set the border color of markers.
trans-unit.target: Per le legende personalizzate, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>proprietà verrà impostata anche il colore del bordo dei marcatori.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MarkerBorderColor property setting has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Ha la precedenza sull'impostazione della proprietà MarkerBorderColor il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>l'impostazione della proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color of a marker border.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore che rappresenta il colore ARGB (alfa, rosso, verde e blu) di un bordo del marcatore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo spessore del bordo dei marcatori, se in uso.

trans-unit.source: Measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Misurato in pixel.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the border width of the markers.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta lo spessore del bordo dei marcatori.

trans-unit.source: The default value is one (1) pixel.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è&1; pixel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore dei marcatori, se utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the color of the markers.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore che rappresenta il colore dei marcatori.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il colore predefinito è <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a marker image of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un'immagine del marcatore dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Represents a path to an image file, which can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un percorso a un file di immagine, che può essere un URL assoluto o relativo.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare gli indicatori, impostare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>proprietà su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MarkerImage property takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà MarkerImage ha la precedenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A marker image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: Un'immagine del marcatore può essere qualsiasi file di grafica valido supportato da .NET Framework, incluse le icone.

trans-unit.source: To set one color of the marker image to be transparent, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare un colore dell'immagine marcatore per essere trasparente, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta l'URL di un file di immagine.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un colore che verrà sostituito con un colore trasparente quando viene disegnata l'immagine del marcatore.

trans-unit.source: The MarkerImageTransparentColor property is used to select one color in a marker image that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà MarkerImageTransparentColor viene utilizzata per selezionare un colore in un'immagine del marcatore che verrà visualizzata come trasparente.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare questa proprietà su qualsiasi valore ARGB (alfa, rosso, verde e blu) valido.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore che rappresenta un colore ARGB (alfa, rosso, verde e blu) che verrà sostituito con un colore trasparente quando viene disegnata l'immagine del marcatore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the legend item markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le dimensioni della legenda i marcatori degli elementi, se utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare gli indicatori, impostare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>proprietà su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that markers will not be applied to data points of pie, doughnut and any stacked chart types.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che gli indicatori non essere applicati ai punti dati di grafici a torta, ad anello e qualsiasi tipo di grafico in pila.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> expression that represents the height and width of the plotting area of markers, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> espressione che rappresenta l'altezza e larghezza dell'area del tracciato di marcatori, in pixel.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 5 pixel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a legend item marker style.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un stile del marcatore elemento legenda.

trans-unit.source: Also used to enable or disable the display of markers.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato anche per abilitare o disabilitare la visualizzazione dei marcatori.

trans-unit.source: To disable markers, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Per disattivare gli indicatori, impostare questa proprietà su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A MarkerStyle integer enumeration that specifies a legend item marker style.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione di valori interi MarkerStyle che specifica un stile del marcatore elemento legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta il nome dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend item separator.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore del separatore dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è applicabile all'intero <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the color of the legend item separator.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore utilizzato per disegnare il colore del separatore dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the separator style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile del separatore dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the separator style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref> valore di enumerazione che specifica lo stile del separatore dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> associata a un elemento della legenda predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà deve essere utilizzata solo nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento, per determinare la serie di dati rappresenta una voce di legenda predefiniti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: The SeriesName property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà NomeSerie si applica a tutti i grafici ad eccezione di grafici a torta e a sfera; i relativi elementi della legenda predefiniti corrispondono ai punti dati tracciati e non per serie tracciata.

trans-unit.source: When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestiscono i grafici a torta e a sfera, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>proprietà invece.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non deve essere impostata dallo sviluppatore.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile all'intero <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that determines the name of the series associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valore che determina il nome della serie associata a un elemento della legenda predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una stringa di lunghezza zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> object associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'indice di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"> </xref> oggetto associato a un elemento della legenda predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà deve essere utilizzata solo nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento per determinare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>oggetto rappresentato da un grafico a torta o sfera grafico voce della legenda predefinita.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points.
trans-unit.target: Tipi di grafico diverso da grafico a torta o grafici sfera restituirà uno negativo (-1), poiché gli elementi della legenda predefiniti corrispondono a serie tracciata e non i punti dati tracciati.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A> property for these chart types.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A>proprietà per questi tipi di grafico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non deve essere impostata dallo sviluppatore.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile all'intero <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> punto dati in un indice in base zero associato del valore che rappresenta la posizione della legenda predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: Tutti i tipi di eccezione a torta del grafico e i grafici ad anello restituirà uno negativo (-1).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore dell'ombreggiatura di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore dell'ombreggiatura di diversi elementi del grafico e può essere impostato su qualsiasi valore ARGB (alfa, rosso, verde e blu) valido.

trans-unit.source: The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
trans-unit.target: Il valore alfa può essere utilizzato per ottenere un effetto di ombreggiatura "realistico"; Provare a utilizzare un colore di "128,0,0,0" per le ombreggiature.

trans-unit.source: To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: Per implementare un'ombreggiatura, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A>proprietà su un valore diverso da zero (0).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **Nota** questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the shadow color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valore che rappresenta il colore dell'ombreggiatura di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: Il colore predefinito è <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'offset dell'ombreggiatura, in pixel, di un elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: Per implementare l'ombreggiatura, utilizzare un valore diverso da zero (0).

trans-unit.source: A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right.
trans-unit.target: Un valore positivo comporterà un'ombreggiatura che vengono spostati verso il basso e a destra.

trans-unit.source: A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.
trans-unit.target: Un valore negativo comporterà un'ombreggiatura che passa alto e verso sinistra.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **Nota** questa proprietà è applicabile solo agli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>oggetti con una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>di uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta l'offset dell'ombreggiatura, in pixel, dell'elemento del grafico pertinente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la descrizione comando dell'elemento della legenda.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di impostare parole chiave speciali per visualizzare diversi tipi di dati correlati al grafico.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Keywords [rs_vsDataVis]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [parole chiave [rs_vsDataVis]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questa proprietà è applicabile all'intero <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta la descrizione comando per l'elemento della legenda.
